text: I am a wizard, not a baboon brandishing a stick
author: Seamus Finnigan

text: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect
author: Luna Lovegood

text: Books! And cleverness! There are more important things — friendship and bravery
author: Hermione Granger

text: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
author: Albus Dumbledore

text: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can’t see where it keeps its brain
author: Arthur Weasley

text: Time will not slow down when something unpleasant lies ahead
author: J.K. Rowling

text: It is the quality of one’s convictions that determines success, not the number of followers
author: Remus Lupin

text: When in doubt, go to the library
author: Ron Weasley

text: If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
author: Sirius Black

text: I am what I am, an’ I’m not ashamed. ‘Never be ashamed,’ my ol’ dad used ter say, ‘there’s some who’ll hold it against you, but they’re not worth botherin’ with.
author: Rubeus Hagrid
